name: Ultramarine Linux 40
install_guide_markdown:
# Ultramarine Linux Installation Guide

Ultramarine Linux uses Anaconda installer for straightforward setup on Fedora base.

install_steps.title: Download ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download Ultramarine 40 ISO from GitHub releases or mirrors.

install_steps.title: Create Installation Media
install_steps.detail_md: Write ISO to USB 3.0 drive (8GB+) using Etcher or similar tool.

install_steps.title: Boot and Select Options
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB, choose 'Test and Install' option from GRUB menu.

install_steps.title: Run Anaconda Installer
install_steps.detail_md: Configure disk, network, user account, and click Install.

install_steps.title: Post-Installation
install_steps.detail_md: Restart, update system with dnf, install additional packages.

license: GPL and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: No default telemetry. Fedora upstream privacy settings apply.
